known_issues: Profile photo is not being applied/updated on the site yet.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/set the provided image as the user's profile photo on the website (currently not applied).

Add the user-uploaded image as the site profile photo by placing it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`, using the uploaded file `cropped_circle_image-1.png` as the source input, and ensure the existing Hero avatar `` continues to load from `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`.

projectName: Apply uploaded profile photo in Hero section
